DOC.brief_summary: This study enroll completers prior 24 week MEMS cap study Kaletra adherence , conduct 2005 - 2006 , repeat MEMS monitor additional 24 week 2008/2009 current antiretroviral anchor drug . The goal study correlate long-term adherence virologic outcome , explore stability MEMS cap adherence measurement time .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Determine Long-term Durability Virologic Suppression Kaletra Recipients With Imperfect Adherence
DOC.criteria: Participation prior Kaletra MEMS cap study Not receive antiretroviral therapy , refusal provide inform consent
